title: game crash
body: at least once a day as of a patch or so ago loading into champ select causes the game to crash, and my mates dont get kicked out right away the lobby only closes once i load back in

replies.body:
Hey there,

That doesn't sound good :(.

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps.

Ive deleted and reinstalled League twice now and no fix, the reason its pissing me off so much is that a mate has just had a baby and is limited on time he can play and i keep getting 5 to 15min timers due to leaving champ select when its not me leaving because i never dodge

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me, let me know if anything helps.

I don't see how any of that applies though, because 90% of games work fine, its just 1 or so a day though 2 days ago i had 2 happen, its just the game crashes to desktop as it tries to transition to champ select
It's possible that a connection issue may be causing the client to crash, this can sometimes occur if malformed data is received by the client.
Well i added all the exceptions to the firewall, what else do you think i should do, also though this issue can't be replicated so i have no way of testing or knowing if any of this works or not

You can basically run through the entire article minus the following

* Packet Loss
* Packet buffering
Nah stuff that, it will take to long without ever knowing if anything actually works, ill just add it to the list of the many things that arnt working correctly for me and my mates

Doesn't really take that long, there's only 3 points left seeing as you've already added firewall exceptions.

* [Switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Port forwarding](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8)
* [Release/Renew IP and flush DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq10)
Thanks anyway, maybe with the client update league will work correctly again
